text.config.cleaner-menus.title: Cleaner Menus - Options
text.config.cleaner-menus.option.addInGa:
Adds the vanilla blur effect to the backgrounds of in-game menus.
Note: The intensity of the blur effect can be set in the vanilla accessibility settings.
text.config.cleaner-menus.option.disable: Disables the darkening of the main menu backgrounds. This includes the pause menu.
